articles.title: Wealth divide between young and old narrowed during pandemic - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The record gulf between the wealth and wellbeing of the oldest and youngest Australians is shrinking for the first time in seven years.
articles.content: The federal government responded by introducing $90 billion wage subsidy scheme JobKeeper and boosting the incomes of those on benefits, including the dole. The majority of this support ended in Marc… [+962 chars]
